title: ADRs for Backlog: App Template + Local Dev Database
description:
Create ADR-008 and ADR-009 documenting architectural decisions for the two open backlog items before implementation begins.

Context from backlog:
- App Template (P1): Landing page + email capture + blog scaffold, bunx create-badass-app pattern
- Local Dev Database (P2): Docker MySQL/Postgres, bun db:up/down scripts, Drizzle migrations

Reference: course-builder patterns for adapters/providers and emaillist provider.

title: Research: Gremlin repo analysis + Matt's course-video-manager applicability
description: Review the entire gremlin project to understand what it is, examine open PRs, and analyze mattpocock/course-video-manager to see how Matt's work can be applied to gremlin.

title: Deep dive: Gremlin repo architecture and purpose
Review open PR: ADR-010 UI component sync strategy
Analyze mattpocock/course-video-manager repo and identify applicability to gremlin
